This is a Wizard API How-to.Â You can see a Wizard menu above the toolbar with Simple Wizard.
In this tutorials we can:
insert either Page 2 or Page 3 after Page 1 (a user makes a choice on Page 1)
choose if or not to show Page 4 after Page 2 or Page 3
When Page 2 is chosen, Page 3 is non-existent (there is no such task) and vice versa (same principle works when Page 3 is chosen)
When page 4 is not chosen, the page still exists but it is just not displayed. A typical example, if there is just one template in Page 4 and we do not need to display it as a user's choice is obvious.
